name: Anna Kournikova's Smash Court Tennis
description: Anna Kournikova's Smash Court Tennis, known in Japan as Smash Court 2 (スマッシュコート2, Sumasshu Kōto Tsū), is a tennis video game developed by Namco for the PlayStation. It is the second title in Namco's Smash Court series of games. The game was released in Japan in November 1998 and was later released in Europe in 1999, featuring the likeness of professional tennis player Anna Kournikova.
